meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sanjay Banerji Claire Alfano Hill Jim Tompkins-MacLaine Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1067.

td.p: Sanjay Banerji, a medical student originally from Bombay, India
Claire Alfano Hill, an instructor from Orlando, Florida
Jim Tompkins-MacLaine, a musician originally from Tiffin, Ohio (whose 3-day cash winnings total $31,401)

tr.td: (Alex: Events that occurred in that year.)
TOYS & GAMES
AWARDS
FASHION HISTORY
BEATLES LYRICS
4-LETTER NAMES
(Alex: In this category, all of the correct responses will have just four letters each in both the first & last names.)
